ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: well from the whineplay forum and my own eyes I ve seen Iksar wandering around Greater Fay (and running to the guards for help). Also people have mentioned
ygData.messageBody:
well from the whineplay forum and my own eyes I've seen Iksar wandering
around Greater Fay (and running to the guards for help).

Also people have mentioned that they have tried almost every city and are
even indifferent to merchants.

20% exp penalty for Regen, Infravision and good faction across the board....
looking for other negatives


-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 6:06 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?


At 05:49 PM 4/27/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Ok I promise this won't become the whineplay forum...
>
>Can someone point out a negative of the iksar? All I see so far is the 20%
>exp penatly. And they're butt ugly :)
>

that 20%exp penalty is pretty damn big. wait til an iksar hits level
35/40/45. and you
thought YOUR exp bar moved slow. plus i think they are kos in a lot of
places.
